--- next_chain.sql
GRAPH FinGraph
RETURN 1 AS a
NEXT
RETURN a + 1 AS b
NEXT
RETURN b + 1 AS c

--- AST
&ast.GQLGraphQuery{
  GraphClause: &ast.GQLGraphClause{
    PropertyGraphName: &ast.Path{
      Idents: []*ast.Ident{
        &ast.Ident{
          NamePos: 6,
          NameEnd: 14,
          Name:    "FinGraph",
        },
      },
    },
  },
  Query: &ast.GQLMultiLinearQueryStatement{
    Statements: []ast.GQLLinearQueryStatement{
      &ast.GQLSimpleLinearQueryStatement{
        Statements: []ast.GQLPrimitiveQueryStatement{
          &ast.GQLReturn{
            Return: 15,
            Items:  []*ast.GQLReturnItem{
              &ast.GQLReturnItem{
                Star: -1,
                Expr: &ast.IntLiteral{
                  ValuePos: 22,
                  ValueEnd: 23,
                  Base:     10,
                  Value:    "1",
                },
                Alias: &ast.AsAlias{
                  As:    24,
                  Alias: &ast.Ident{
                    NamePos: 27,
                    NameEnd: 28,
                    Name:    "a",
                  },
                },
              },
            },
          },
        },
      },
      &ast.GQLSimpleLinearQueryStatement{
        Statements: []ast.GQLPrimitiveQueryStatement{
          &ast.GQLReturn{
            Return: 34,
            Items:  []*ast.GQLReturnItem{
              &ast.GQLReturnItem{
                Star: -1,
                Expr: &ast.BinaryExpr{
                  Op:   "+",
                  Left: &ast.Ident{
                    NamePos: 41,
                    NameEnd: 42,
                    Name:    "a",
                  },
                  Right: &ast.IntLiteral{
                    ValuePos: 45,
                    ValueEnd: 46,
                    Base:     10,
                    Value:    "1",
                  },
                },
                Alias: &ast.AsAlias{
                  As:    47,
                  Alias: &ast.Ident{
                    NamePos: 50,
                    NameEnd: 51,
                    Name:    "b",
                  },
                },
              },
            },
          },
        },
      },
      &ast.GQLSimpleLinearQueryStatement{
        Statements: []ast.GQLPrimitiveQueryStatement{
          &ast.GQLReturn{
            Return: 57,
            Items:  []*ast.GQLReturnItem{
              &ast.GQLReturnItem{
                Star: -1,
                Expr: &ast.BinaryExpr{
                  Op:   "+",
                  Left: &ast.Ident{
                    NamePos: 64,
                    NameEnd: 65,
                    Name:    "b",
                  },
                  Right: &ast.IntLiteral{
                    ValuePos: 68,
                    ValueEnd: 69,
                    Base:     10,
                    Value:    "1",
                  },
                },
                Alias: &ast.AsAlias{
                  As:    70,
                  Alias: &ast.Ident{
                    NamePos: 73,
                    NameEnd: 74,
                    Name:    "c",
                  },
                },
              },
            },
          },
        },
      },
    },
  },
}

--- SQL
GRAPH FinGraph RETURN 1 AS a NEXT RETURN a + 1 AS b NEXT RETURN b + 1 AS c
